institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Ministry of Employment and Labor Consignment Project Subsidy Processing Rules/Article 6 (Payment of Subsidy)
contents: Article 6 (Payment of subsidy) ① When the person in charge of account deposit wishes to pay the subsidy through firm banking, the name or title of each subsidy payment recipient, resident registration number or business management number, type of subsidy, etc. to the Korea Employment Information Service through the employment insurance system. The payment amount (if there is a fraction of less than 10 won, the fraction is not calculated in accordance with Article 47 (1) of the National Treasury Management Act) and the designated account must be sent., ② The person in charge of account deposit or the agent must provide their respective ID and A password must be used, and the applicant, recipient, depositor, account number, and support amount must be confirmed on the payment request computer screen and materials for the decision to pay support funds, such as course recognition and cost support applications and review reports, before making a bank transfer., ③ If the data requested to be remitted to the entrusted financial institution becomes insolvent, the person in charge of account deposit must decide on repayment after confirming the reason for insolvency and process the repayment in accordance with the provisions of paragraphs 1 to 3.
